mapper.sql: select id, name, pid, last_stage, examine_id, content, assessment_department, deleted, from gr_assessment_examine
mapper.select: select t2.*,t1.lvl from (SELECT @r AS _id, (SELECT @r := pid FROM gr_assessment_examine WHERE id COLLATE utf8mb4_general_ci= _id) AS parent_id, @l := @l + 1 AS lvl FROM (SELECT @r := #{id}, @l := 0) vars, gr_assessment_examine h WHERE @r <> '0' ) t1 join gr_assessment_examine t2 on t1._id COLLATE utf8mb4_general_ci =t2.id order by t1.lvl desc
